scripts.test:dist:e2e: npm run instrument-build && start-server-and-test preview http://127.0.0.1:4173/ 'DEBUG=code-coverage cypress run --e2e'
scripts.test:dist:component: npm run instrument-build && start-server-and-test preview http://127.0.0.1:4173/ 'cypress run --component --quiet --reporter spec'
scripts.test:dist:ci: npm run instrument-build && start-server-and-test preview http://127.0.0.1:4173/ 'cypress run --component --quiet --reporter spec && cypress run --e2e'
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:dev:component:ci && concurrently --kill-others --success first "npm run dev" "wait-port localhost:4173 && wait-port localhost:8000 && npm run test:dev:e2e:ci"
scripts.//comment-test:dev: The below scripts are intended to be run against the dev server running npm run dev in a separate terminal window
scripts.test:dev:ci: npm run test:dev:component:ci && npm run test:dev:e2e:ci
